channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Meks Easy Social Share
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Meks Easy Social Share

item.title: CVE-2022-2574|2024-08-03T00:39:08.073Z -- unknown -- meks%20easy%20social%20share
item.description: The Meks Easy Social Share WordPress plugin before 1.2.8 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
